mapper.insert: insert into cn_company (id, user_id, name, abbr, industry, establish_time, province, city, district, address, official_web, product, introducation, file_id, create_time, update_time, logo) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{establishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officialWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cn_company set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abbr = #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, establish_time = #{establishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, official_web = #{officialWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introducation = #{introducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, name, abbr, industry, establish_time, province, city, district, address, official_web, product, introducation, file_id, create_time, update_time, logo from cn_company where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, name, abbr, industry, establish_time, province, city, district, address, official_web, product, introducation, file_id, create_time, update_time, logo from cn_company
